explanations.reason: The paper focuses on the incidence of hospital-acquired conditions (HACs) after total joint arthroplasty (TJA) and the financial implications of these conditions. It uses statistical methods like bivariate and multivariable analysis to identify patient and hospital factors associated with HACs. There is no mention of any machine learning techniques, algorithms, or models in the title or abstract, nor any indication that such methods were used in the study.
